entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Eskasoni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 3:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: W 23 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
